post:
Happy Holidays everyone! We have this incredible deal on our 10 Gbps network dedicated server:

~CPU: Dual Intel Xeon E5-2650 (2 GHz, 16 Cores, 32 Threads)

~RAM: 32GB

~Storage: 1 TB SATA or 240GB SSD

~IPv4 Address: 5 IPs

~IPv6 Address: /64 Subnet

~Monthly Bandwidth: 20 TB@10 Gbps dedicated connection

~Price: $49.99/month with coupon LOWENDTALK | Order Now

All orders will automatically get 10Gbps connection at 1 Gbps price.
